plot: Caillou's first airplane ride brings lots of new experiences: a fun breakfast, an amazing view out the window and a trip to the flight deck with Daddy. Caillou and his family then prepare for a day at the beach, where there's so much to see and do. Caillou and Daddy play in the water, and later a seagull steals Caillou's sandwich! Also today, Caillou misses his friend Sarah when she goes on a trip and he's left behind. The puppets set out lawn chairs and towels and encourage Teddy to have his own vacation in the backyard.
